markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The heart of the [Rathun](/rathun/) and their civilization, built around a massive shrine to Magran.

## Points of interest

* The Keep is a long slog through waves upon waves of Rathun if you decide to fight. However, if you visited the Lair of the Ancient first and have the Torc, you can pass through peacefully, talking to [Bathor Erkon](/bathorErkon/) in the shrine, who will decide your fate. The wings of the keep contain more warriors and minor loot, so unless you fancy the Gloves, stick to the course and reach Bathor.

## Characters

* [Bathor Erkon](/bathorErkon/): The leader of the Rathun.

## Loot

* [Knapped Scoria Figurine](/knappedScoriaFigurine/): In the workshop before the shrine. 
* [Firethrower's Gloves](/firethrowersGloves/): In the locked box in the trapped corridor to the southeast of the aforementioned workshop.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Jagged Keep, The}}

==Background==
The heart of the [[Rathun]] and their civilization, built around a massive shrine to Magran.

==Points of interest==
* The Keep is a long slog through waves upon waves of Rathun if you decide to fight. However, if you visited the Lair of the Ancient first and have the Torc, you can pass through peacefully, talking to [[Bathor Erkon]] in the shrine, who will decide your fate. The wings of the keep contain more warriors and minor loot, so unless you fancy the Gloves, stick to the course and reach Bathor.

==Characters==
* [[Bathor Erkon]]: The leader of the Rathun.

==Loot==
* [[Knapped Scoria Figurine]]: In the workshop before the shrine. 
* [[Firethrower's Gloves]]: In the locked box in the trapped corridor to the southeast of the aforementioned workshop.
